body: Your extensive training with traditional gnome weapons gives you an advantage.
name: Gnome Weapon Focus
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/New Racial Rules/Gnome Feats/Gnome Weapon Focus

sections.body: Base attack bonus +1, gnome, proficient with all martial weapons.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with gnome weapons (weapons with "gnome" in the title).
sections.name: Benefit
